Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class Friends

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Friends
public class Friends extends Object
Manages the "friends" in the maze game. Friends are either on the map waiting to be saved or following the player after being saved. This class handles their rendering, movement, saving, and interaction with the player and other entities. Friends can collide with walls or be caught by a Griever, affecting the player's lives. It also manages saving and loading friend states.

  • Constructor Details

    • Friends

      public Friends(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map, Player player)
      Constructs a Friends instance, initializing friends' textures, positions, and states.
      Parameters:
      map - the TiledMap containing the friends' positions
      player - the player object for initial friend placement

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, Player player)
      Renders all friends, including map friends and followers. Displays "help me!" above unsaved map friends when the player is nearby.
      Parameters:
      batch - the SpriteBatch used for rendering
      player - the player object for proximity calculations

    • checkAndSaveMapFriend

      public boolean checkAndSaveMapFriend(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 playerPosition, float proximity, int index)
      Checks if the player is within the specified proximity to a map friend at the given index. If the friend is within range and has not been saved, they are marked as saved, added to the list of following friends, and a sound effect is played.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - the current position of the player
      proximity - the maximum distance within which a friend can be saved
      index - the index of the map friend to check
      Returns:
      true if the friend was saved, false otherwise

    • checkAndSaveAllMapFriends

      public int checkAndSaveAllMapFriends(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 playerPosition, float proximity)
      Iterates through all map friends to check if they are within the specified proximity to the player. Marks any nearby unsaved friends as saved, adds them to the list of following friends, and increments the count of saved friends.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - the current position of the player
      proximity - the maximum distance within which friends can be saved
      Returns:
      the number of friends saved during this check

    • updateFollowingPositions

      public void updateFollowingPositions(Player player, float delta)
      Updates the positions of friends following the player based on the player's movement. The first friend moves towards the player, while subsequent friends follow the friend directly in front of them. If no friends are following, the last player position is updated.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose movement the friends follow
      delta - the time elapsed since the last frame

    • update

      public void update(Player player, HUD hud, float interactionRadius, float delta, Griever griever, Wall wall)
      Updates the positions of friends following the player, checking for collisions with other game entities such as Grievers or walls.
      Parameters:
      player - the player object for movement calculations
      hud - the HUD for managing game statistics
      interactionRadius - the radius within which friends can be saved
      delta - the time elapsed since the last frame
      griever - the Griever object for collision detection
      wall - the Wall object for collision detection

    • removeFriendAt

      public void removeFriendAt(int index)
      Removes a friend at the specified index from the list of friends following the player.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the friend to remove

    • checkFriendCollisionWithGriever

      public void checkFriendCollisionWithGriever(Griever griever, HUD hud)
      Checks for collisions between friends following the player and the Griever. If a collision is detected, the friend is removed, and the player's lives are decremented.
      Parameters:
      griever - the Griever object representing the monster
      hud - the HUD object for managing game statistics, such as player lives

    • checkFriendsCollisionWithWall

      public void checkFriendsCollisionWithWall(Wall wall, HUD hud)
      Checks for collisions between friends following the player and moving walls. If a collision is detected, the friend is removed, and the player's lives are decremented.
      Parameters:
      wall - the Wall object representing the moving wall
      hud - the HUD object for managing game statistics, such as player lives

    • saveFriendState

      public void saveFriendState()
      Saves the state of all friends (both map friends and followers) to preferences.

    • getFollowingFriendsPositions

      public List<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2> getFollowingFriendsPositions()

    • loadFriendState

      public void loadFriendState()
      Loads the state of all friends (both map friends and followers) from preferences.

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Releases resources used by the Friends class, including textures and fonts.
